name: Megadance Unity
description:
Megadance Unity

Can you move as fast as Unity? Choose from a variety of characters and stages to dance and obtain the highest score. Avoid traps that could block you from getting points.

This game is now available for Windows and Android systems. This is my first major Android release so bugs may be expected.

Youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCXzcduiD99hcDMhhCzByRiA

This game does a high score system on the Gamejolt website, if you do not have a Gamejolt login just press "Cancel" on the Main Menu.
